products.name: Cofee body scrub
products.description: Caffeine in coffee  dilate blood vessels and heal dimples
products.effects: coffeeallergies could result in inflammation, rashes, anaphylaxis, shortness of breath, shoot up blood sugar levels, induce nausea and in some cases, even shock. Hence, taking care of your intake is highly important.
products.instruction: Mix together 1/2 cup fresh ground coffee and 1/2 cup brown sugar.Add 1/2 cup coconut oil into the coffee mixture and 1 tsp. vanilla extract Mix until well combined Gently rub the mixture over your body—avoid areas around the eyes. Leave it on for several minutes. Rinse thoroughly.

products.name: Turmeric soap
products.description: Great for Fading dark marks, acne, and inflammation
products.effects: turmeric allergies could result in inflammation, rashes, anaphylaxis, shortness of breath, shoot up blood sugar levels, induce nausea and in some cases, even shock. Hence, taking care of your intake is highly important.
products.instruction: Start by melting your soap base in the microwave in a bowl or over low heat in a saucepan. Stir in the turmeric until well mixed in. Then add your skin safe essential oils. Allow to cool a little if soap is really hot before adding your oils so they don't evaporate

products.name: Aleo vera soap
products.description: Clean the pores and strengthens the superficial dermis layer
products.effects: Aleo vera allergies could result in inflammation, rashes, anaphylaxis, shortness of breath, shoot up blood sugar levels, induce nausea and in some cases, even shock. Hence, taking care of your intake is highly important.
products.instruction: After washing the hands, use the fingertips to apply a small amount of the gel to the face. Gently cleanse the face with the aloe vera using a circular motion, covering all the skin. Rinse with cool water and gently pat dry.
